creator: edith@apache.org
text:
ERROR core.i18n - Bundle <cocoon://i18n-catalogue/cmsui_en.xml> not loaded:
Exception
org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Must set a generator before adding
transformer 'xslt'


When the catalogue cmsui_en.xml doesn't exist, the catalogue cmsui.xml is
considered. There shouldn't throw an error message.
